hero.headline: Cultivating Strategic Youth for Global Action
hero.description: The Center for Strategic Youth and Global Affairs (CSYGA) is a youth-led platform dedicated to equipping the next generation of leaders with strategic tools to influence global policy and governance. From diplomacy and conflict resolution to academic exchange and policy innovation, CSYGA empowers youth as active agents of change in today's complex international landscape.

quote.text: "Young people don't just participate, they lead. Every program is designed to amplify youth voices in international strategy and diplomacy."
quote.author: CSYGA Youth Centric Approach

testimonials.heading: What Our Delegates Say
testimonials.description: Hear from participants who attended our New Diplomacy Conference 2025

items.quote: The New Diplomacy Conference offered inspiring perspectives on youth, technology, and global cooperation. It was a valuable experience to be part of this environment.
items.author: Isa Guluzade

items.quote: I had a wonderful experience at the conference. It was truly diverse, engaging, and very helpful for my personal and professional growth. The sessions were well-organized, and the overall environment was motivating and inspiring.
items.author: Meerab Niaz

items.quote: It was a wonderful program for me and I learnt many things regarding the international system. Very well thought out event in terms of audience management, quality of the panelists, and socializing opportunities.
items.author: Sakibou Salifou
